name: About
body:
### About Us
---
The BontoTTI Information and Communication Technology Department is committed to naturing young talent in Computing and imparting knowledge to learners, preparing them for the Job market and to make them responsible revolutionists.

Here below are the links to download the publisher notes and TA assignment for the DICT September class:
[Notes](https://github.com/BTTI/About/blob/gh-pages/introduction-publisher.pdf)
[Assignment](https://github.com/BTTI/About/blob/gh-pages/mpexercise.doc)

When through with the assignment, [email to](eugene.otolo@gmail.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
